recurse_link_files[source]

recurse_link_files(src_dataset, target_dir, only_suffixes:Optional[List[str]]=None)

Copy the directory structure of src_dataset and link the files from the src_dataset to target_dir.

This minimizes the storage-space, while allowing to add local files.

Optionally provide only_suffixes to skip all files that do not have one of the provided extensions. These extensions must start with .
